data.scheme_name: MSME Innovative Scheme  - IPR Component  - Reimbursement of Patent/ Geographical Indications/ Trademarks/ Design  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides reimbursement on patent/trademark/registrations of the actual costs or expenses incurred towards registration ranging from Rs.0.10 lakh to Rs. 5 Lakhs
data.eligibility: All MSMEs registered with the UDYAM registration portal (of the MoMSME) will be eligible.
data.conditions: Applicant has to submit a self-declaration for not claiming funding from any Central/State Government for the same patent/trademark/design.
data.beneficiaries: All MSMEs registered with the UDYAM registration portal (of the MoMSME) will be eligible.
data.prerequisites: Applicant has to submit a self-declaration for not claiming funding from any Central/State Government for the same patent/trademark/design.
data.context: This scheme is introduced to promote a culture of innovation and creative problem solving through knowledge sharing and collaboration amongst industry.
data.objective: The aim is to enhance the awareness of Intellectual Property Rights (IPRs) amongst the MSMEs and to encourage creative intellectual endeavour in Indian economy.
data.description:
Scheme provides reimbursement to the eligible applicants under the IPR component is as follows : 

  • Foreign Patent : Rs. 5.00 lakh 
  • Domestic Patent : Rs. 1.00 lakh 
  • GI Registration : Rs. 2.00 lakh 
  • Design Registration : Rs. 0.15 lakh 
  • Trademark : Rs. 0.10 lakh
data.how_to_apply: Appliants can apply on the below mentioned portal Portal link - https://my.msme.gov.in/MyMsme/Reg/COM_IprReim.aspx
data.funding_facilitator: Development Commissioner (DC), Ministry Of Micro, Small And Medium Enterprises
data.funding_mechanism:
• Reimbursement process will be initiated after the acceptance of Application and payment will be made directly to the beneficiary. 
  • Reimbursement will be made to eligible MSME enterprise subject to receipt of copy of MSME Udyam Registration certificate, copy of patent/trademark/Design/GI registration certificate, copy of bank mandate form & Bills/Vouchers in original.
data.additional_info:
• The financial assistance under this component will be available to those who have not availed any Central/State Government subsidy for the same purpose. 
  • The MSME Innovative scheme is designed by integrating three components of CLCSTUS (viz., Incubation, Design & IPR) schemes to create CHAMPIONS, where each component can have interoperability with other components during the phases of intervention to enhance capacities/capabilities of champion MSMEs. 
  • MSME can have opportunity to suitably interlink benefits among three components during the period/stage of implementation. 
  1. There are some options of various combinations like- 
    Only Incubation OR Only Design OR Only IPR 
  2. Incubation-Design-IPR 
  3. Incubation-Design 
  4. Incubation to IPR 
  5. Design-IPR MSME can apply for any one of the above combinations. 
  • The financial assistance will be applicable for availing the benefits as per the individual scheme component. 
  • One scheme may enter from one completed gate to the gate of another scheme as per the requirement of the MSME, while ensuring that the original scheme it enrolled for is taken to the natural conclusion. 
  • At the time of applying for the next scheme, the applicant should adhere to the respective scheme guidelines for that particular scheme.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. University affiliation       
2. Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. AICTE approval letter/Certificate      
3. Other/NABL accreditation       
4. Last 2 years, audited annual accounts with the auditorâ€™s report 
5. Proof of No. of students enrolled during previous two years  
6. Audited financial statements of Business incubators (B.I.)

data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
